articles.author: Julian Bovill
articles.title: Rio Ferdinand offers sympathy to Harry Maguire after bomb threat - Daily Mail
articles.description: Having endured a tough week on the pitch and violent threats off it, Ralf Rangnick chose to take his captain out of the firing line for the Saturday lunchtime trip to top four-chasing Arsenal.
articles.content:
Manchester United legend Rio Ferdinand has sympathised with current skipper Harry Maguire after it emerged he had been issued a bomb threat following Tuesday's defeat at Anfield.

articles.title: Arsenal fans dedicate minute's applause to Cristiano Ronaldo after death of his newborn son - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ronaldo's partner, Georgina Rodriguez, gave birth to twins, but the Portuguese striker confirmed in a statement on Monday that his newborn son had passed away.
